snippet: China Development Bank, which lends billions for infrastructure projects, has seen its own borrowing costs soar by about 50 percent, adding to the debate over whether the country can defy pessimists and continue to outgrow its neighbors
abstract: China Development Bank, which lends billions for infrastructure projects, has seen its own borrowing costs soar by about 50 percent, adding to the debate over whether the country can defy pessimists and continue to outgrow its neighbors

headline.main: Amid Raft of Chinese Financial Numbers, One to Watch Carefully
